item.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 DLC character Akaza (Infinity Castle) launches December 19
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Third "Infinity Castle - Part 1 Character Pass" fighter dated.

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 downloadable content character Akaza (Infinity Castle) will launch on December 19, publisher Aniplex and developer CyberConnect2 announced.

Akaza (Infinity Castle) can be purchased individually via the “Akaza (Infinity Castle) Character Pack,” or as part of the “Infinity Castle – Part 1 Character Pass,” which includes access to multiple other characters.

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 1 in Japan and August 5 in the west.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Akaza (Infinity Castle) Trailer

item.title: Tales of series 30th anniversary memorial video
item.content:encoded:
"The beginning of a new journey."

Bandai Namco has released a memorial video in celebration of the Tales of series‘ 30th anniversary. The first entry in the series, Tales of Phantasia, launched for Super Famicom on December 15, 1995—30 years ago today in Japan.

The video description reads: “The Tales of series celebrates its 30th anniversary on December 15, 2025. Thirty years of history, made possible thanks to all of you. This 30-year milestone is not an end, but the beginning of a new journey. We will continue to pursue the ‘Tales of style’ that has been loved across generations, and weave stories together with all of you.”

The full lineup of titles highlighted in the video include:

  • Tales of Phantasia (1995)
  • Tales of Destiny (1997)
  • Tales of Eternia (2000)
  • Tales of Destiny 2 (2002)
  • Tales of Symphonia (2003)
  • Tales of Rebirth (2004)
  • Tales of Legendia (2005)
  • Tales of the Abyss (2005)
  • Tales of Tempest (2006)
  • Tales of Innocence (2007)
  • Tales of Symphonia: Knights of Ratatosk (2008)
  • Tales of Vesperia (2008)
  • Tales of Hearts (2008)
  • Tales of Graces (2009)
  • Tales of Xillia (2011)
  • Tales of Xillia 2 (2012)
  • Tales of Zestiria (2015)
  • Tales of Berseria (2016)
  • Tales of Arise (2021)

Watch the video below.

Tales of Series 30th Anniversary Memorial Video



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/tales-of-series-30th-anniversary-memorial-video
